channel.title: Need A Good Free Host That Supports SMF Reqs
channel.description:
My domain hosters hosting doesn't have the right req. for PHP to support SMF. I don't want to create a free forum, and then forward my domain to that. I want my forums to be in a directory on my own url. www.urlhere.com/smf.
Anyone know any good free hosting that will support SMF but gives me a lot of room for myself?

item.title: Need A Good Free Host That Supports SMF Reqs
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Your all pathetic.

Just let this thread die.

Read full topic

item.title: Need A Good Free Host That Supports SMF Reqs
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:10, topic:38679”][quote author=pwnage1 link=topic=54485.msg740384#msg740384 date=1168064253]
heck ill give you free hosting no ads its hosted off my home comp
[/quote]
i don’t think i would trust you. (yet) with my or someone else’s material(not saying your evil or blah blah blah) but a more… professional or well known person would be more safe because on a home pc, it makes your pc more vunalrable(depending on your security) also you can edit it, delete it, or modify it with keyloggers and such that most people would not like in any-way-what-so-ever.

Not trying to say people should not trust you though.[/quote]

and you dont think hackers like to look whats on peoples ftps. its possible for someone to crack an ftp within 30 mins if they know the address

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @hazorduz hazorduz
item.description:
@hazorduz wrote:

kloplop321:

i use a great host called hostek, you can pay $4(USD)(monthly) for 10 gigs of bandwith, mySQL support, 500mg of space, i got smf working on mine, email, and much more stuff.

My friend is way better then that
he does $1 for every gig of space and 5 gigs of bw
but he does an awesome $10 monthly pack
For $10 you get 250GIGs space and 2 Terabytes of Bandwidth
PHP included WAREZ Allowed, Cpanel, Fantastico, And Alot More
contact me for details - lmao_mate@hotmail.com
